views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 6 through 12.

InstaLauncher lets you access ANY app in less than 500 milliseconds. With an activator action of your choice you can bring up a launcher with every app (and more) you have installed listed in alphabetical order. It will also show you recently started apps and a number of favourites that you can choose.

Features
- Access any app almost instantly
- Activator integration
- Shows recently opened apps
- Favourites, unlimited in numbers
- Add or remove apps
- Add or remove the panels (recent apps / favourites)
- Adapts to your current hand (left/right) (See video)
- Works on iPhone and iPad

See video and screenshots for a brief demonstration

1.6.3 This version is the last version to be hosted on BigBoss repo. For future updates, please use the Packix repo version. Changes are adding Packix repo message in settings app, etc. 1.6.2
- Fix WhatsApp not being put in the right folder
- Remove iOS 12 specific system apps
1.6.1
- iPhone X notch compatibility
- Remove some system apps
- Add debug option to see app identifiers


1.6
- iOS 11 compatibility
- iPhone X compatibility
- Optimized startup time
- White theme
1.5.3
- Fix tweak not loading on iOS 7 (may cause iOS 6 and below to stop working)

1.5.2
- Fix crash on iOS 8 after recent iOS 10 update

1.5.1
- iOS 10 compatibility
- Make sorting case insensitive
1.5
- Add option to animate IL in when activated
- Add option to use light version of blur (iOS 8+)
- Add option to use legacy blur (WARNING: Leaks memory)

1.4
- Fix memory issues some people experienced.
- Fix all orientations issues on all supported devices. Tested on iOS 7,8,9 with iPad 2/Air and iPhone 4/5s/5s + various others through beta testers.
- Fix close button sometimes disappearing.
- Added persistent “Recent” panel.
- Added native iOS+ blurred background (Unsupported on older devices like iPad 2). Older devices/OSs gets a static gray translucent background.
1.3.2
- iPad on iOS 9 size bug fixed
- Blacklisted some system apps for iOS 9.2+
1.3.1-1
- iOS 9 compatibility
1.3-1
- iOS 8 ready
- Changed icon to be in line with Assistive+ and upcoming InstaToggles
- iOS 6 should still work, if changing settings seems to not work, respring.
1.2-5
- Fixed crashes in previous version

1.2-4
- Optimised initial startup
- Removed leftover NSLogs (oops)
- Removed in-settings-contact-panel for now
1.2-3
- Made favourites sorted in alphabetical order
- Made the "invisible" button more transparent

1.2-2
- Updated settings panel
- Change settings identifier (Settings will get reset, sorry)
1.2-1
- iOS 7 and arm64 support
- Added option to group "non-standard" named apps (Chinese characters etc.)
1.1-1
- Added the ability to force the alphabet to left or right
- Added an in-launcher close button
- Added subtle animations when opening and closing the launcher

There is a bug within the library AppList that sometimes makes the launcher crash. The main crash area is within the settings panel on devices with lots of apps and / or slower devices. If it crashes you can usually just try again, or uninstall some apps and then try again.
